content:
the problem i have succesfully downlaod but how can i save them in a specefied directory the issue im having if i download nothidden it replaces my hiddenfiles, -rw-rw-rw- 1 1001 0 3563 Mar 03 2022 passwd
-rw-rw-rw- 1 1001 0 2074 Mar 03 2022 shadow
226 Directory send OK.
ftp> cd ..
250 Directory successfully changed.
ftp> ls
200 EPRT command successful. Consider using EPSV.
150 Here comes the directory listing.
drwxr-xr-x 2 0 0 4096 Feb 01 2021 hiddenftpfolder
drwxr-xr-x 2 0 0 4096 Jan 28 2022 nothidden
226 Directory send OK.
ftp> cd nothidden
250 Directory successfully changed.
ftp> ls
200 EPRT command successful. Consider using EPSV.
150 Here comes the directory listing.
-rw-r--r-- 1 0 0 24 Jan 28 2022 flag3
-rw-r--r-- 1 0 0 3487 Jan 28 2022 passwd
-rw-r--r-- 1 0 0 1992 Jan 28 2022 shadow
226 Directory send OK.
ftp> get flag3
local: flag3 remote: flag3
200 EPRT command successful. Consider using EPSV.
150 Opening BINARY mode data connection for flag3 (24 bytes).
100% |\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*| 24 28.33 KiB/s 00:00 ETA
226 Transfer complete.
24 bytes received in 00:00 (8.43 KiB/s)
ftp> get passwd
local: passwd remote: passwd
200 EPRT command successful. Consider using EPSV.
150 Opening BINARY mode data connection for passwd (3487 bytes).
100% |\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*| 3487 8.39 MiB/s 00:00 ETA
226 Transfer complete.
3487 bytes received in 00:00 (2.39 MiB/s)
ftp> get shadow
local: shadow remote: shadow
200 EPRT command successful. Consider using EPSV.
150 Opening BINARY mode data connection for shadow (1992 bytes).
100% |\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*| 1992 1.98 MiB/s 00:00 ETA
226 Transfer complete.
1992 bytes received in 00:00 (780.93 KiB/s)
